item.title: ZHEN DING RESOURCES INC 10-K
item.description: ZHEN DING RESOURCES INC, which is in the Metal Mining [1000] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 01, 2021 had 16896 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 211 instances financial - 162 instances 31 - 143 instances may - 139 instances december - 130 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
